formulas.description: If Lead has been converted, readonly
formulas.name: accessField
businessScale_View_Formula
funcN_GetDomicileLatitude
funcN_GetDomicileLongitude
formulas.expression: IF( AND( FIND('@', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}) > 0, FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value})) > 0, FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value})) + 1) > 0 ), IF( ISNUMBER( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), VALUE( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Domicile_Map.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), 0 ), 0 )

formulas.name: funcN_GetLegalLatitude
funcN_GetLegalLongitude
formulas.expression: IF( AND( FIND('@', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}) > 0, FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value})) > 0, FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value})) + 1) > 0 ), IF( ISNUMBER( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), VALUE( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Contact_Legal_Map.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), 0 ), 0 )

formulas.name: validate_IDNumber_Must16Digits
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_ID_Number}), LEN({!Contact_ID_Number}) = 16), '', '- Please input 16 digit number')

formulas.name: validate_JobAddress_Min3Char
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_Job_Address}), AND(LEN({!Contact_Job_Address}) >= 3, LEN({!Contact_Job_Address}) <= 80)), '', '- Please enter 3-80 characters.')

formulas.name: validate_LegalAddress_Min3Char
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_Legal_Address}), AND(LEN({!Contact_Legal_Address}) >= 3, LEN({!Contact_Legal_Address}) <= 80)), '', '- Please enter 3-80 characters.')

formulas.name: validate_NPWP_Must1516Digits
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_NPWP_Number}), LEN({!Contact_NPWP_Number}) = 16, LEN({!Contact_NPWP_Number}) = 15), '', '- Please input 15 or 16 digit number')

formulas.name: validate_SpouseIDNumber_Must16Digits
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Spouse_ID_Number}), LEN({!Spouse_ID_Number}) = 16), '', '- Please input 16 digit number')

formulas.name: validate_SpouseJobAddress_Min3Char
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Spouse_Job_Address}), AND(LEN({!Spouse_Job_Address}) >= 3, LEN({!Spouse_Job_Address}) <= 80)), '', '- Please enter 3-80 characters.')

textTemplates.name: tpl_Domicile_Zip_Code
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedDomicileKelurahanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_DomicileCity
textTemplates.text: Select code__c, Id,Name from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!Contact_Domicile_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_DomicileKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select code__c, Id, Name from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedDomicileCityId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_DomicileKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select code__c, Name from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedDomicileKecamatanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_IndustryGroup
textTemplates.text: Select attributes_industry_group_description__c, count(parent_id_formula__c) from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where parent_id_formula__c = '{!Contact_Economy_Sector_New.selectedChoiceValues}' group by attributes_industry_group_description__c

textTemplates.name: tpl_IndustryType
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, name__c from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where attributes_industry_group_description__c = '{!func_GetIndustryGroup}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Legal_Zip_Code
textTemplates.text: select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedKelurahanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_LegalCity
textTemplates.text: Select code__c, Id,Name from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!Contact_Legal_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_LegalKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select code__c, Id, Name from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedCityId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_LegalKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select code__c, Name from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedKecamatanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Spouse_IndustryGroup
textTemplates.text: Select attributes_industry_group_description__c, count(parent_id_formula__c) from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where parent_id_formula__c = '{!Contact_Spouse_Economy_Sector.selectedChoiceValues}' group by attributes_industry_group_description__c

textTemplates.name: tpl_Spouse_IndustryType
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, name__c from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where attributes_industry_group_description__c = '{!func_Spouse_GetIndustryGroup}'
